description.narrative: (i) To improve the technical efficiency and financial sustainability of LWSC and improve access to water supply and sanitation services for urban consumers in Lusaka, Kafue, Chongwe, and Luangwa districts, and (ii) to strengthen the effectiveness of national water supply and sanitation planning.

condition.narrative: Government shall ensure payments to LWSC for water and sewerage services provided to its ministries and departments within 60 daysof the claim
Government shall ensure payments to LWSC for water and sewerage services to the Approved Agencies shall be made to LWSC by notlater than September 30 of each subsequent calendar year.
Project Implementing Entity Implementing shall not incur any debt
Project Implementing Entity shall ensure that payments for services/goods are made within 60 days
Project Implementing Entity shall not declare dividend with respect to share capital
